title: Strategies for Enhancing Instructor Work Efficiency in Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Online science education course applying student-centered pedagogy in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform scientific reasoning with 80% accuracy by analyzing online science experiment data.
Learners can compose peer evaluation feedback at least three times using a peer assessment system.
Instructors can reduce formative assessment processing time by 30% using mobile-friendly evaluation tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
